nodes.text: The Tol Amn system lay within the Hutt Space portion of the Slice. The system was located on the hyperlane called the Oktos Route that connected it both to the planet Toydaria and the hyperspace route known as the Trax Tube.
The Tol Amn system contained a planet of the same name that was used by members of the Hutt species for foodstuff production, with serfs of various species being employed to that end.
The Tol Amn system was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square R-11.
